Package de.esoco.lib.comm.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HttpRequestHandler.HttpRequestMethodHandler
    An interface for the handling of the distinct HTTP request methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpHeaderTypes
    Definitions of relation types that represent the names and datatypes of header fields in HTTP requests.
    HttpRequest
    A class that collects the data of an HTTP request and additional information (like headers) in it's relations.
    HttpRequestHandler
    A Server request handler implementation for HTTP requests.
    HttpResponse
    A class that contains the data of an HTTP response and additional response information (like headers) in it's relations.
    ObjectSpaceHttpMethodHandler
    A HTTP request method handler that retrieves the data of it's responses from an ObjectSpace.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpHeaderTypes.HttpHeaderField
    Enumeration of HTTP header field names.
    HttpRequestMethod
    An enumeration of the different HTTP request methods.
    HttpStatusCode
    An enumeration of the standard HTTP 1.1 status codes as defined in the HTTP RFC 2616.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HttpStatusException
    An unchecked exception to report exceptional HTTP responses.
    HttpStatusException.EmptyRequestException
    A subclass that indicates a bad request that has no content.
